plugin._field_explanation: 0: ............... default 2D texture (white) 1: ............... default normal map (no bump) 2: ............... default cube map (error pattern) 3: ............... color bars 4: ............... black 2D texture 5: ............... transparent black 2D texture 6: ............... gray 2D texture 7: ............... auto exposure weight 8: ............... auto exposure weight (4x3) 9: ............... stencil dither pattern 10: ............... smooth noise warp 11: ............... ripple pattern 12: ............... rain ripple 13: ............... unsigned noise 14: ............... MLAA area map 15: ............... red 2D texture 16: ............... green 2D texture 17: ............... blue 2D texture 18: ............... cyan 2D texture 19: ............... dxt5 atlas texture 20: ............... dxn atlas texture 21: ............... foam texture 22: ............... extra pc colorgrade for xbone compat
0: ............... lightmap falloff sharpening 6: ............... Approximate specular curve

0: ............... debug 1: ............... debug2d 2: ............... copy w/ scale 8: ............... debug_mesh 11: .............. bloom: kernel blur (11 horizontal) 12: .............. bloom: kernel blur (11 vertical) 13: .............. cubemap: blur (phi) 14: .............. cubemap: blur (theta) 15: .............. cubemap: clamp 16: .............. cubemap: divide 17: .............. write depth 18: .............. final composite 20: .............. transparent 22: .............. postprocess hologram 23: .............. arbitrary gaussian blur 24: .............. hologram composite 25: .............. geo fog 26: .............. particle update 29: .............. downsample 2x2 30: .............. rotate 2d 33: .............. final composite (with DOF) 34: .............. convolve 5-tap kernel 36: .............. yuv to rgb 37: .............. displacement 39: .............. downsample 4x4 block 40: .............. depth of field downsample 45: .............. stencil 4x4 dither pattern 46: .............. lens flare render 49: .............. bloom: NEW downsample 4x4 gaussian 51: .............. copy 52: .............. shadow geometry 54: .............. gradient 55: .............. alpha test 56: .............. patchy fog 57: .............. light volume 58: .............. water ripple 59: .............. double gradient 60: .............. sniper scope 61: .............. shield impact 63: .............. bloom merge layers 64: .............. final composite dirt 67: .............. final composite dof dirt 69: .............. copy to correct colorspace 76: .............. shadow apply point 78: .............. shadow apply fancy 79: .............. shadow apply faster 80: .............. bokeh blur 84: .............. shadow apply variance 87: .............. shadow apply variance no normal test 88: .............. max blur:............ max amount to blur, as a percentage of the screen blur scale:.......... scales blur for a given velocity center falloff:....... reduces motion blur around the screen center (larger values give smaller reduction regions...) expected dt:.......... expected time per tick, in seconds (used to correct motion blur in fast/slow frames)

_field_real.name: max blur{max blur x}:[0 - 0.2]#max amount to blur, as a percentage of the screen
blur scale{blur scale x}:[0 - 0.5]#scales blur for a given velocity
center falloff x:[0 - 20]#larger values make smaller areas of no blur
center falloff y:[0 - 20]#larger values make smaller areas of no blur
debug lighting value#we will replace the albedo with this value across RGB
albedo clip min#pixels that have an albedo below this value will get colorized blue in the albedo clip debug display
albedo clip max#pixels that have an albedo above this value will get colorized red in the albedo clip debug display
